sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<record_update table="x_166541_ibm_resil_resilientrecord">
    <x_166541_ibm_resil_resilientrecord action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <name>SNow Incident to Resilient Task</name>
        <number>RES0001002</number>
        <resilient_id_field>u_resilient_id</resilient_id_field>
        <servicenow_table>incident</servicenow_table>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2018-01-30 22:29:52</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>4f349a600fcc1300bc87ba8ce1050e7a</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2018-01-31 16:51:16</sys_updated_on>
        <u_mapping_description>Create Resilient Task From ServiceNow Incident</u_mapping_description>
        <u_mapping_script><![CDATA[// date is like this 2017-10-11 05:37:16
var unixTime = gr.due_date;
if (unixTime){
	unixTime = new GlideDateTime(unixTime);
	unixTime = unixTime.getNumericValue();
}
else{
	unixTime = null;
}

// Create new Resilient Task
var task = {
	"name": "[" + gr.number + "] " + gr.getValue("short_description"),
	"instr_text": gr.getValue("short_description"),
	"due_date": unixTime
};
task;]]></u_mapping_script>
    </x_166541_ibm_resil_resilientrecord>
</record_update>
